Text: Please seed! I really, really, really want this before this weekend!
well as soon as I noticed 2001 a space odyssey isnt in the list I knew I wouldnt download it
Because not having a certain movie on a list means the rest of the movies on the list suck? GG Mr. Logical, your loss.

Most of these movies are ones with less notariaty than they deserve. 2001 and 2010 are movies that everyone knows. Class A Sci-Fi Classic movies. Like Star Wars trilogy, Star Trek The Motion Picture, and Planet of the Apes. Any self respecting Sci-fi movie collector would already have these movies, so, shouldn't matter. 

These movies are really more for people who truly enjoy sci-fi for sci-fi and not for the sake of having a collection.  Yeah, there's some exceptions there, still. If you're too stuck up to download other good movies cause one is missing - one you should already own, then you, sir, need a job at the white house.
THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!!!!!!!!
